name: Technology and Training
program_description:
Students majoring in Technology & Training will complete a 
minimum of 49 semester hours of University Core Requirements with a 
grade of 'C' or better, 21 semester hours of Management/ Communication 
Skills, 30 semester hours of Technical Core and 30 semester hours 
of OI&LS undergraduate courses. (For any possible substitutions on 
the program of studies as stated below, please consult with the 
Undergraduate Program Advisor for approval.)<ol<li<p<strongUniversity Core Requirements:</strong (49 hours minimum)</p<ol<li<p<strongWriting & Speaking </strong(12 hours) Grade Credit</p<ul<li<pC & J (any)</p</li<li<pEng 101</p</li<li<pEng 102</p</li<li<pEng 219</p</li</ul</li<li<p<strongMathematics </strong(6 hours Math 121 & above)</p</li<li<p<strongPhysical and Natural Science</strong (7 hours minimum with lab)</p</li<li<p<strongSocial and Behavioral Science</strong (9 hours minimum)</p<ul<li<pEcon 105 or 106</p</li<li<pSoc 101</p</li<li<pPsych 105</p</li</ul</li<li<p<strongHumanities</strong (6 hours minimum)</p<pSelect two courses from among the following:</p<ul<li<pAmerican Studies 186</p</li<li<pComparative Literature & Cultural Studies 223, 224</p</li<li<pEnglish 150, 292, 293</p</li<li<pForeign Languages (M.
